alert.note: Alert for St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:21PM CDT until July 01 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Talladega County in east central Alabama... Central St. Clair County in central Alabama... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 420 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Chalkville to Logan Martin Lake, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Talladega, Pell City, Leeds, Moody, Springville, Odenville, Lincoln, Margaret, Argo, Riverside, Munford, Bald Rock, Talladega Superspeedway, Harrisburg, Branchville, Talladega Municipal Airport, Logan Martin Lake, Honda Manufacturing Of Alabama, Country Club Estates and Wattsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
